div.p:
Folgende Abfragen stehen zur Verfügung. Die Angabe von start_time und end_time ist optional. Fehlen diese Angaben, werden die Parameter start_time und end_time ausgewertet.
isCompletedAfter (end_time)
isCompletedBefore (end_time)
isCompletedSuccessfulAfter (end_time)
isCompletedSuccessfulBefore (end_time)
isCompletedWithErrorAfter (end_time)
isCompletedWithErrorBefore (end_time)
isStartedAfter (start_time)
isStartedSuccessfulAfter (start_time)
isStartedWithErrorAfter (start_time)
isStartedToday
isStartedTodayCompleted
isStartedTodayCompletedSuccessful
isStartedTodayCompletedWithError
isCompletedToday
isCompletedTodaySuccessful
isCompletedTodayWithError
Wenn eine Auswertung false liefert, beendet sich der Job mit einem Fehler. Das Ergebnis wird außerdem auf dem Parameter result zurückgeliefert.

These queries are available. The setting for start_time and end_time is optional. When missing, the parameters start_time and end_time will be taken.
isCompletedAfter (end_time)
isCompletedBefore (end_time)
isCompletedSuccessfulAfter (end_time)
isCompletedSuccessfulBefore (end_time)
isCompletedWithErrorAfter (end_time)
isCompletedWithErrorBefore (end_time)
isStartedAfter (start_time)
isStartedSuccessfulAfter (start_time)
isStartedWithErrorAfter (start_time)
isStartedToday
isStartedTodayCompleted
isStartedTodayCompletedSuccessful
isStartedTodayCompletedWithError
isCompletedToday
isCompletedTodaySuccessful
isCompletedTodayWithError
When the result is false the job ends with an error. The result will be given with the parameter result.
